app.title: Kaplinsky Dialer
app.hero: Free voice calls right in the browser. Works even when WhatsApp/Telegram are blocked.
app.subtitle: Simple and reliable WebRTC call. Works even in restricted networks (TURN 443/TCP).
howto.title: How to Call
howto.step_start: Click “Start Call” and send the generated link to your partner.
howto.step_answer: Ask your partner to open the link in an external browser and click “Answer Call”.
howto.step_end: After connecting, only the “Hang Up” button remains.
howto.tip_open_external: Open the link in an external browser (in WhatsApp/Telegram → “Open in browser”).
howto.tip_https: Make sure the site is opened via HTTPS.
about.lead: Kaplinsky Dialer is a small and modest free hobby project. The goal is simple and reliable voice communication right in the browser.
about.privacy1: Conversations are not recorded or shared with anyone.
about.privacy2: Technically, server-side recording is not implemented.
dev.client_loaded_vite: Client loaded (Vite dev, TURN relay policy from config.js)
room.ready_share_link: Room is ready. Share the link or wait for the peer to join
room.no_room_in_url_caller: No room in URL — this is Caller
debug.title: Debug
debug.copy_and_send: Copy and send us during debugging.
hint.send_invite_whatsapp: Send the link to your partner (in WhatsApp → “Open in browser”).
offline.title: Dialer — Offline
offline.hint: To make a call, you need to restore the connection. Check the network and refresh the page.
